inspiration.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
inspiration.author: Steve Jobs

inspiration.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
inspiration.author: John Lennon

inspiration.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
inspiration.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspiration.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
inspiration.author: Aristotle

inspiration.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
inspiration.author: Tony Robbins

success.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
success.author: Winston Churchill

success.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
success.author: John D. Rockefeller

success.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
success.author: Walt Disney

success.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
success.author: Steve Jobs

success.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
success.author: Winston Churchill

motivation.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
motivation.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivation.text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.text: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
motivation.author: Unknown

life.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.text: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
life.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

life.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
life.author: Socrates

life.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
life.author: Confucius

life.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
life.author: Dalai Lama
